contentList.content: Bolster
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Deception, Intimidation, Performance, and Persuasion.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Deception, Intimidation, Performance, and Persuasion.

Decline any racial ability at this level.
Archer
You are proficient with all bows, and gain a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attacks</LSTag> and damage.
Pickpocket
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="SleightOfHand">Sleight of Hand</LSTag>.
Mistwalker
Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.
